price: (Ingatlah) pada hari (ketika) Kami menghantam mereka dengan keras.795) Kami pasti memberi balasan.
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ
footnotes: *795) Hantaman yang keras itu terjadi pada perang Badar, ketika orang-orang musyrik dipukul mundur sehingga menderita kekalahan, dan banyak di antara pemimpin mereka yang tewas.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yawma nabṭishu al-baṭshata al-kub'rā innā muntaqimūna
